name: Pilum LRM Pod
customPrimary: Second-stage hits on shields have a chance to arc through to weapons and engines, dealing %s EMP damage. The chance to pierce the shields is based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Locust SRM Casette
customPrimary: Saturate targets with large numbers of low-yeld warheads.

name: Breach SRM (Triple)
customPrimary: Each missile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.
